meanings.sent1: The chaperoned students went on a field trip.
meanings.sent2: The chaperoned teenager attended the school dance.
meanings.sent3: The chaperoned puppy was the star of the pet show.
meanings.sent4: The chaperoned package arrived safely at its destination.
meanings.sent5: The chaperoned child felt safe and protected during the outing.

meanings.definition: Supervised or monitored by a chaperone.
meanings.sent1: The chaperoned event ensured everyone's safety.
meanings.sent2: The chaperoned party was a fun and secure gathering.
meanings.sent3: The chaperoned movie night had extra eyes on the snacks.
meanings.sent4: The chaperoned project was completed without any issues.
meanings.sent5: The chaperoned excursion was a well-organized adventure.
